definition: the act of projecting out from something, extend out or project in space
details:
noun
- the act of projecting out from something
= synonyms: projection
- something that bulges out or is protuberant or projects from its surroundings
= synonyms: extrusion
verb
- extend out or project in space
= example: extend out or project in space
= synonyms: project, protrude, stick out, jut out
